instructions: 1. For _zero (0), use the singular form with {{count}}, e.g. '{{count}} خطأ'
2. For _two (dual form), use the special dual form WITHOUT the {{count}} variable, e.g. 'خطآن'
3. For _few (3-10), use the plural form with {{count}}, e.g. '{{count}} أخطاء'
4. For _many (11+), use the appropriate form with {{count}}, e.g. '{{count}} خطأ'
5. For _other (fallback), use the same form as _many
